bibl.title: Envelope with Cuban Clara Maass stamp, August 24, 1951

div1.p: This is a commemorative first day cover, which features the Clara Maass postage stamp and a drawing of Lutheran Memorial Hospital.

div1.head: Envelope with Cuban Clara Maass stamp, August 24, 1951
div1.p:
50th ANNIVERSARY
CONQUEST of YELLOW FEVER
CHRISTMAS 1951

LUTHERAN MEMORIAL HOSPITAL
NEWARK, NEW JERSEY

Gave her life in the conquest of yellow fever
Dio la vida por la conquista de la fiebre amarilla

HOSPITAL LAS ANIMAS,
HABANA, CUBA, AUGUST 24, 1901

Descubrimiento del Agento
trasmisor de la fiebre ama-
rilla por el Dr. Carlos J.
Finlay

Emisión de sellos comme-
morativa cincuenta fa-
llecimiento de Clara Louise
Maass.

PRIM DIA DE CIR ULACION
24 de agosto de 1951.

· LUTHERAN · MEMORIAL · HOSPITAL · OF · NEWARK · N.J. ·
SOLA FIDE
